Your house is the biggest on your street.
Your house is the (bigger/biggest) on your street.

She makes the best cake in the world.
She makes the (better/best) cake in the world.

Flying in an airplane is the fastest type of transportation.
Flying in an airplane is the (faster/fastest) type of transportation.

That was the hardest book we have ever read.
That was the (harder/hardest) book we have ever read.

He had the worst cold ever.
